label: IndexerRuntime
description: Represents the indexer's cumulative runtime consumption in the service.

fields.label: Beginning Time
fields.tooltip: Beginning UTC time of the 24-hour period considered for indexer runtime usage (inclusive).

fields.label: Ending Time
fields.tooltip: End UTC time of the 24-hour period considered for indexer runtime usage (inclusive).

fields.label: Remaining Seconds
fields.tooltip: Cumulative runtime remaining for all indexers in the service from the beginningTime to endingTime, in seconds.

fields.label: Used Seconds
fields.tooltip: Cumulative runtime of the indexer from the beginningTime to endingTime, in seconds.
